numlitem.para: Both EICAS systems are operative, and
All other Standby Bus indications are verified to be operative.
Substitute the "STANDBY BUS OFF" EICAS advisory message for the inoperative standby power bus OFF light in the STANDBY BUS OFF non-normal procedure.

placard.para: Placard Standby Power Bus OFF Light "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Place the Standby Power Selector to OFF, then BAT, then AUTO and observe the following conditions:
OFF - EICAS displays STANDBY BUS OFF advisory message.
BAT - DISCH light illuminates, no STANDBY BUS OFF message on EICAS.
AUTO - DISCH light extinguishes, no STANDBY BUS OFF message on EICAS.
